component.name: TmuxGUI

description.p: TmuxGUI is a modern, native GNOME application that provides a graphical interface for managing tmux sessions, windows, and terminals.

ul.li: Session management: create, rename, delete tmux sessions
Window management: create, rename, close and reorder windows
Integrated VTE terminal with full tmux support
File browser with search and favorites
Drag and drop support for reordering

screenshot.caption: Main window with session sidebar and terminal

description.p: Initial release with full session and window management.
